description: RAPTOR Plugin Error Messages - Consistent error handling across all plugins

support.message: For help, report issues at: https://github.com/mbrg/raptor/issues

SEMGREP_NOT_INSTALLED.message: Semgrep is not installed or not in PATH

CODEQL_NOT_INSTALLED.message: CodeQL CLI is not installed or not in PATH

AFL_NOT_INSTALLED.message: AFL++ is not installed or not in PATH
AFL_NOT_INSTALLED.solution:
Install:
  macOS: brew install afl-fuzz
  Linux: apt install afl++ or build from source
  Source: https://github.com/AFLplusplus/AFLplusplus

RR_NOT_INSTALLED.solution:
Install:
  Linux: sudo apt install rr
  Source: https://github.com/rr-debugger/rr

Note: rr requires Linux with perf_event_paranoid <= 1
  Check: cat /proc/sys/kernel/perf_event_paranoid
  Fix: sudo sysctl kernel.perf_event_paranoid=1

GDB_NOT_INSTALLED.solution:
Install:
  Linux: sudo apt install gdb
  macOS: brew install gdb (or use lldb)

NO_LLM_API_KEY.solution:
Set one of these environment variables:
  export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=your_key
  export OPENAI_API_KEY=your_key

NO_GCP_CREDENTIALS.solution:
Setup steps:
1. Create Google Cloud Project: https://console.cloud.google.com/
2. Enable BigQuery API
3. Create Service Account with 'BigQuery User' role
4. Download JSON credentials
5. Set: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=/path/to/credentials.json

Note: BigQuery offers 1 TB/month free queries.

PERMISSION_DENIED.solution:
Check file permissions or run with appropriate privileges.
Path: {path}

TIMEOUT.solution:
The operation took longer than expected.
Consider increasing the timeout or running on a smaller target.
Operation: {operation}
Timeout: {timeout}s

RAPTOR_NOT_FOUND.solution:
The RAPTOR plugin requires the main RAPTOR framework.
Ensure raptor.py is accessible at: $RAPTOR_ROOT/raptor.py

If using plugins standalone, clone the RAPTOR repo:
  git clone https://github.com/mbrg/raptor.git
  export RAPTOR_ROOT=/path/to/raptor

MACOS_SHM_LIMIT.message: macOS shared memory limit may be too low for fuzzing

NO_ASAN.solution:
For better crash detection, recompile with:
  clang -fsanitize=address -g your_code.c

RATE_LIMIT.solution:
Consider using authenticated requests for higher limits.
GitHub: Set GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable
BigQuery: Already using service account
